TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDocumentStructureProvider

Docs.summary: Defines a method for adding the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an XPS package, see chapter 9 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure AddDocumentStructure() cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.
Docs.returns: An that represents the part of an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an XPS package, see chapter 9 of the XML Paper Specification (XPS) specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
